did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.abstract: Muster Roll for the Light Infantry in the Third Regiment, Third Brigade, and First Division of the Pulaski's Guards Militia, commanded by Lieutenant John Caldwell. Roll dates from May 1838.

processinfo.head: Processing Information

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: No historical information on this muster roll could be confirmed.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Company Muster Roll for the Light Infantry in the Third Regiment, Third Brigade, and First Division of the Pulaski Guards Militia, commanded by Lieutenant John Caldwell from May 1838. There are other members of the company listed including non-commissioned officers, Sergeants John B. Badger, Chancy Page, and Joseph Harris; Corporals Joseph W. Howard, John H. Howard, and Hiram F. Foster; and Musicians Joshua Simpson, Joseph Rowell, and Cornelius Fuller. Other names are listed but could not be identified.
